feed.title: Lead‑ing
feed.subtitle: Practical leadership for teens & 20‑somethings—continuous growth, one playbook at a time.

entry.title: Welcome to Lead‑ing
entry.content: I’ll publish practical essays, runnable playbooks, and scripts you can use this week. Subscribe via RSS or the newsletter.
entry.summary: I’ll publish practical essays, runnable playbooks, and scripts you can use this week. Subscribe via RSS or the newsletter.

entry.title: Welcome to Lead‑ing
entry.content:
Lead‑ing is leadership as a continuous practice. This site gives you scripts, playbooks, and tools you can use this week in school, clubs, sports, online communities, or your first job.

Every post ends with a Try this today challenge. If you use a playbook, tell me what happened so I can improve it.
entry.summary: Lead‑ing is leadership as a continuous practice. This site gives you scripts, playbooks, and tools you can use this week in school, clubs, sports, online communities, or your first job.

entry.title: Why “Lead‑ing”?
entry.content: Leadership is a verb. The “‑ing” reminds us to practice: small actions, repeated, that compound into trust.
entry.summary: Leadership is a verb. The “‑ing” reminds us to practice: small actions, repeated, that compound into trust.
